page.title: 15FARMING. NASH AREA
page.content: There are 10 farms worked by full time farmers and 8 people farm some land. 450 acres are tenanted. The remainder owner occupied. 4OO acres are permanent grassland, the rest is arable on a rotational pattern with some grass leys. There is a small amount of soft fruit grown. There is one dairy herd consisting of 105 cows and heifers. 28 breeding cows for beef and a total of 450 beef cattle, 120 completely barn fed, the remainder glass fed in summer and wintered indoors. Four farmers keep sheep, one has a breeding flock of 115 and another 100 breeding ewes. There is a total of 250 sheep. FARMS_ Barnhill; Holywell; Tyrellcote; Elmtree; Ninelands; Furzenfield; Blackfields; Langridge; Yew Tree; Thornton Hall; Potash.
